abstract: William D Williams, brother of Cleveland Police Chief Calvin Williams, is found dead in his Cleveland home; Dana Johnson, victim's girlfriend and suspect in his death, is in critical condition after shooting herself when state troopers stopped her car in Pennsylvania.
lead_paragraph: William D. Williams was killed in Cleveland, and his girlfriend, suspected in his death, shot herself when troopers stopped her vehicle along a Pennsylvania highway, the authorities said.

headline.main: Ohio: Brother of Cleveland’s Police Chief Is Killed

snippet: William D. Williams was killed in Cleveland, and his girlfriend, suspected in his death, shot herself when troopers stopped her vehicle along a Pennsylvania highway, the authorities said.
